discourse_list.title: Know Your MIP #18 | MIP97 & MIP 98 | DAO-level Objectives and Work Proposals

content.content: Know Your MIP #18 | MIP97 & MIP 98 | DAO-level Objectives and Work Proposals      For this series’ 18th session, we will take a deep dive into the frameworks behind MIP97 & MIP 98, DAO-level Objectives and Work Proposals. This MIP set is the evolution of Work-based Budgeting, and aims to give the DAO better tools to enable a decentralized workforce. MIP97 - DAO-level Objective Framework is a consensus tool for Governance to define work, while MIP98 - Work Proposal Framework is a coordination tool for enabling funding in exchange for value. The MIP set will enter the Frozen Period on February 1st, and is actively incorporating feedback prior to this deadline. The MIPs are slated to enter the February Governance Cycle. It is expected that improvements and amendments to the MIPs will be ongoing as this tool is refined during its use.  We will host…   @Retro & @Juan from the Ecosystem Cluster.   Agenda:  MIP97: DAO-level Objective Framework MIP98: Work Proposal Framework Enabling Work-based Budgeting Q&A   Join us!  If you can’t make this call, post any questions you may have for our guests on this forum post, and our hosts will ask them during the Q&A.  When Time in your local-timezone format: 2022-01-31T16:00:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where    Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Attn: @Core-Facilitators @Recognized-Delegates @GovAlpha-Core-Unit

I just went over mips 96-98, they look interesting and generally like positive steps. That said, I’m not sure they’re ready for the February cycle. I noted a few issues as I went through, the chief of which is that there are still WIP sections which will have no time for feedback to be taken into account before a vote. I think I’d like to contribute to them, if you’re open to it, and assuming they are pushed back. I’ll be at the meeting shortly.
